last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: By 1945 there had been no improvement in the food situation, and the winter brought with it the worst fuel crisis of the war. Ruth saves on gas by using a steamer to make elderflower fritters, while Harry cultivates haricot beans and celebrates VE day.

name: The Wartime Kitchen and Garden
overview: Join Ruth Mott and Harry Dodson as the show us how they managed during WW2.
